Events that occurred on 11 February.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 97.
1952 - Actor Paul Norell is born.
1953 - Wayne G. Hammond is born.
1994 - Voice actor William Conrad dies.
2008 - The Tolkien Estate, The Tolkien Trust and HarperCollins file a lawsuit against New Line Cinema and the Saul Zaentz Company.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
The beginning of Coirë and Echuir.
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring rests in Lothlórien.
